titleStmt.title: Wisdome and innocence, or prudence and simplicity in the examples of the serpent and the dove, propounded to our imitation. By Tho. Vane doctor in divinity and physick.
titleStmt.author: Vane, Thomas, fl. 1652.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Crook, and J. Baker, and are to be sold at the sign of the Ship in St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Ship in St. Pauls Church-yard
